value.name: Denver DA Rules Police Officers Justified In Shooting Death Of Christopher Escobedo After Holding Hostage At Gunpoint
value.description: Denver District Attorney Beth McCann has ruled that Denver police officers were justified in shooting and killing a man who held a woman hostage at gunpoint. The shooting happened Sept.
